name: Mainstays Monkey Decorative Bath Collection - Shower Curtain
categoryPath: Seasonal/College Living/Why Pack it/Bath & Body Pick up Today

reviews.name: Mainstays Monkey Decorative Bath Collection - Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText: This shower curtian is so soft, and since it's washable it's that much more adorable.... Especially when you can wash it time after time... ; )
reviews.title: Super adorable

reviews.name: Mainstays Monkey Decorative Bath Collection - Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText:
We bought this for daughters bathroom and it looks great.
We did a good search for shower curtains in all the leading stores and this was a wow for the price.
reviews.title: Great Looking Shower Curtain!

reviews.name: Mainstays Monkey Decorative Bath Collection - Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText: This shower curtain is cute and a lot of fun! Whoever says it's just for kids is silly. I just got my first apartment and I love this curtain so much it really brought life and color to my small bathroom. It's thin and it is cloth so you can wash it in the washing machine no problem. Great for anyone who wants or needs a new and fun curtain!
reviews.title: Monkeys everywhere!!!

reviews.name: Mainstays Monkey Decorative Bath Collection - Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this curtain. I washed it on delicate and dried on low heat before hanging and it came out of the drier perfectly ready to hang, not a wrinkle in it. I love the light material and bright colors, so much nicer than I expected! I found one thing to be weird, the set of monkey shower curtain hooks came with 12, and my liner used all 12, however the curtain only used 11?!
reviews.title: Love it, so impressed!

reviews.name: Mainstays Monkey Decorative Bath Collection - Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText: bright colors & cute monkeys how can you go wrong?
reviews.title: Very cute!
